rules_text:
Levialord Empireo can't be blocked by creatures with mana value 3 or less.
When Levialord Empireo enters the battlefield, return all nonland permanents with mana value 3 or less to their owners hands.
{U}{U}{U}: Return Levialord Empireo from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell with mana value 3 or less, copy it unless they pay {2}.
{4}, {T}: Transform Levailord's Grave. It gains “When this card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere exile it instead.”
